string-array.name: workoutDescriptions
string-array.item: Week 1 Day 1 Five-minute warmup walk. Then alternate 60 seconds of jogging and 90 seconds of walking for a total of 20 minutes.
Week 1 Day 2 Five-minute warmup walk. Then alternate 60 seconds of jogging and 90 seconds of walking for a total of 20 minutes.
Week 1 Day 3 Five-minute warmup walk. Then alternate 60 seconds of jogging and 90 seconds of walking for a total of 20 minutes.
Week 2 Day 1 Five-minute warmup walk. Then alternate 90 seconds of jogging and two minutes of walking for a total of 20 minutes.
Week 2 Day 2 Five-minute warmup walk. Then alternate 90 seconds of jogging and two minutes of walking for a total of 20 minutes.
Week 2 Day 3 Five-minute warmup walk. Then alternate 90 seconds of jogging and two minutes of walking for a total of 20 minutes.

Week 3 Day 1 Five-minute warmup walk, then do two repetitions of the following:
• Jog 90 seconds
• Walk 90 seconds
• Jog three minutes
• Walk three minutes

Week 3 Day 2 Five-minute warmup walk, then do two repetitions of the following:
• Jog 90 seconds
• Walk 90 seconds
• Jog three minutes
• Walk three minutes

Week 3 Day 3 Five-minute warmup walk, then do two repetitions of the following:
• Jog 90 seconds
• Walk 90 seconds
• Jog three minutes
• Walk three minutes

Week 4 Day 1 Five-minute warmup walk, then:
• Jog 3 minutes
• Walk 90 seconds
• Jog 5 minutes
• Walk 2-1/2 minutes
• Jog 3 minutes
• Walk 90 seconds
• Jog 5 minutes

Week 4 Day 2 Five-minute warmup walk, then:
• Jog 3 minutes
• Walk 90 seconds
• Jog 5 minutes
• Walk 2-1/2 minutes
• Jog 3 minutes
• Walk 90 seconds
• Jog 5 minutes

Week 4 Day 3 Five-minute warmup walk, then:
• Jog 3 minutes
• Walk 90 seconds
• Jog 5 minutes
• Walk 2-1/2 minutes
• Jog 3 minutes
• Walk 90 seconds
• Jog 5 minutes

Week 5 Day 1 Five-minute warmup walk, then:
• Jog 5 minutes
• Walk 3 minutes
• Jog 5 minutes
• Walk 3 minutes
• Jog 5 minutes

Week 5 Day 2 Five-minute warmup walk, then:
• Jog 8 minutes
• Walk 5 minutes
• Jog 8 minutes
Week 5 Day 3 Five-minute warmup walk, then jog 20 minutes with no walking.

week 6 Day 1 Five-minute warmup walk, then:
• Jog 5 minutes
• Walk 3 minutes
• Jog 8 minutes
• Walk 3 minutes
• Jog 5 minutes

Week 6 Day 2 Five-minute warmup walk, then:
• Jog 10 minutes
• Walk 3 minutes
• Jog 10 minutes
Week 6 Day 3 Five-minute warmup walk, then jog 22 minutes with no walking.
Week 7 Day 1 Five-minute warmup walk, then jog 25 minutes.
Week 7 Day 2 Five-minute warmup walk, then jog 25 minutes.
Week 7 Day 3 Five-minute warmup walk, then jog 25 minutes.
Week 8 Day 1 Five-minute warmup walk, then jog 28 minutes.
Week 8 Day 2 Five-minute warmup walk, then jog 28 minutes.
Week 8 Day 3 Five-minute warmup walk, then jog 28 minutes.
Week 9 Day 1 Five-minute warmup walk, then jog 30 minutes.
Week 9 Day 2 Five-minute warmup walk, then jog 30 minutes.
The final workout! Five-minute warmup walk, then jog 30 minutes.
